name: Star Hammer Tactics
description:
Battle the mysterious alien Nautilids and decide the fate of the planet Novus!

Star Hammer Tactics is a tactical battle game that anyone can learn to play in minutes. Challenge the devious AI in single player mode, or compete against friends in local hotseat multiplayer.

Achieve victory by outwitting your opponents, and blasting them to little pieces!


Star Hammer Tactics is a tactical battle game that anyone can learn to play in minutes.

Play in skirmish mode and challenge the devious AI in single player mode, or compete against friends in local hotseat multiplayer. Or take on the 15 scenario campaign to protect the planet Novus from certain annihilation!

Achieve victory by outwitting your opponents, and blasting them to little pieces!

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement and this item's use restrictions. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 console systems and 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
